API Lifecycle

Blueprints

Providing a framework to define the API lifecycle in a modular and flexible enough way that anyone can use to define their own version of the API lifecycle using a common set of elements and actions being applied across operations.

Base

These are the base blueprints we use to define the API lifecycle, laying a base that anyone can use define their own.

The Base of the API Lifecycle

This represents the base of the API lifecycle that anyone should be thinking about.

Blueprint

New APIs

If you are creating a new API, these are the blueprints we recommend as your entrance to the API lifecycle for your organization.

New API Using the OpenAPI Specification

A blueprint for beginning the API lifecycle by designing a new API using an OpenAPI, showing one possible lifecycle from end to end.

Blueprint

New API Using the AsyncAPI Specification

A blueprint for beginning an event-driven API lifecycle by designing a new API using an AsyncAPI.

Blueprint

Prototype a New API Using a Postman Collection

A blueprint for beginning the API lifecycle by prototyping an API using a Postman collection.

Blueprint

Creating a New GraphQL API

Creating a new GraphQL API to provide a data API that allows consumers to query the whole graph.

Blueprint

Existing APIs

If you are working with an existing API, these are the blueprints we recommend as your entrance to the API lifecycle.

Manually Define Collection for Existing API

A blueprint for beginning the API lifecycle by manually defining a collection.

Blueprint

Generate OpenAPI a New API Using Code Annotations

A blueprint for beginning the API lifecycle by automatically generating an OpenAPI.

Blueprint

Import WSDL for an Existing SOAP Web Service

A blueprint for beginning the API lifecycle by importing a WSDL for an existing SOAP web service.

Blueprint

Reverse Engineer

Often times we need to reverse engineer the APIs that already exist behind the applications we depend upon.

Generate Collection From Existing API Powering a Web Application

A blueprint for beginning the API lifecycle by generating a collection from a web application.

Blueprint

Generate Collection From Existing API Powering a Mobile Application

A blueprint for beginning the API lifecycle by generating a collection from a mobile application.

Blueprint

Automation

If you are working with an existing API, these are the blueprints we recommend as your entrance to the API lifecycle.

Build a Business Workflow

A blueprint for beginning the API lifecycle by designing a new API using an OpenAPI.

Blueprint

Test Automation

A blueprint for understanding the different aspects of API test automation.

Blueprint

About this API Lifecycle Project

This project runs on Github, and the lifecycle blueprints, elements, and actions are defined as YAML, and the website is powered using Jekyll, allowing everything to be updated in a collaborative way using Git.
